children.name: drawImage
children.description:
Draw an image to the Canvas. For more detailed information, check out 'https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D#drawImage()'. This method can be used in three different ways:

1. `drawImage(image, dx, dy)`: Draws the image at the given coordinate.

2. `drawImage(image, dx, dy, dw, dh)`: Scales the image to the right dimaensions before drawing it at the given coordinates.

3. `drawImage(image, sx, sy, sw, sh, dx, dy, dw, dh)`: Cuts the a part of the image out of the original, scales it and draws it to the Canvas.

arguments.name: image
arguments.description: The image to draw to the Canvas.

arguments.name: sx
arguments.description: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the sub-rectangle of the source.

arguments.name: sy
arguments.description: The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the sub-rectangle of the source.

arguments.name: sw
arguments.description: The width of the sub-rectangle of the source.

arguments.name: sh
arguments.description: The height of the sub-rectangle of the source.

arguments.name: dx
arguments.description: The x-coordinate at which to draw the image on the Canvas.

arguments.name: dy
arguments.description: The y-coordinate at which to draw the image on the Canvas.

arguments.name: dw
arguments.description: The width of the image on the Canvas (this will scale the image).

arguments.name: dh
arguments.description: The height of the image on the Canvas (this will scale the image).

children.name: createPattern
children.description:
Create a pattern from any DOM Element.

> __Note:__ Use a pattern as a value for strokeStyle or fillStyle;

arguments.name: DOM element
arguments.description: The Element to repeat in the pattern. This can be any DOM Element, although typically an `` element is used.

arguments.name: type
arguments.description:
How the element should be repeated. Possible values are:

- *repeat*: A normal repetition, in all directions. This is the default.

- *repeat-x*: Only repeat horizontally.

- *repeat-y*: Only repeat vertically.

- *no-repeat*: Do not repeat the element.
